SEARCH
Package Services

Interface MedicalRecordInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
MedicalRecordManager
public interface MedicalRecordInterface
Interface for managing medical records.

This interface provides methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting medical records, as well as updating the corresponding CSV file.

Since:
2024-11-21
Version:
1.0

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static MedicalRecord
    createMedicalRecord(String patientID)
    Creates a new medical record for a patient with the specified ID.
    static boolean
    deleteMedicalRecord(String patientID)
    Deletes a medical record for a specific patient based on their ID.

    Reads and displays all medical records.

  • Method Details

    • updateCSV

      static int updateCSV()
      Updates the CSV file containing medical records.
      Returns:
      An integer indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • createMedicalRecord

      static MedicalRecord createMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Creates a new medical record for a patient with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient for whom the medical record is being created.
      Returns:
      A MedicalRecord object representing the created medical record, or null if the creation failed.

    • readAllMedicalRecords

      static int readAllMedicalRecords()
      Reads and displays all medical records.
      Returns:
      An integer indicating the number of medical records read successfully.

    • readMedicalRecordsByPatientID

      static int readMedicalRecordsByPatientID(String patientID)
      Reads and displays medical records for a specific patient based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose medical records are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An integer indicating the number of medical records found for the patient.

    • updateMedicalRecord

      static MedicalRecord updateMedicalRecord(String patientID, String diagnosis, String medication, String treatment)
      Updates an existing medical record with new information.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose medical record is to be updated.
      diagnosis - The updated diagnosis for the patient.
      medication - The updated medication details for the patient.
      treatment - The updated treatment plan for the patient.
      Returns:
      A MedicalRecord object representing the updated medical record, or null if the update failed.

    • deleteMedicalRecord

      static boolean deleteMedicalRecord(String patientID)
      Deletes a medical record for a specific patient based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the patient whose medical record is to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the medical record was successfully deleted; false otherwise.
